message.body: Leesie. I'm sorry I never responded to these texts! Yes now I have everything I need to survive in my apartment which means I am bored as fuck. How are you? How is the beach?
Good! Parents finally peaceful. It's storming, so i'm reading to the lighthouse on the porch and waiting for lightning. Sister-brat is here. Content-elise.
I am sitting in my pink chair at corals table. This is my only furniture. It looks sad :P
So you successfully beat off your mother's antiques?
Yep. I have one of my grandmas dressers but that's it. Lizzy is bringing a couch and a table. But she isn't moving in for two weeks >.<
￼Two weeks! I should just come stay until then... Beyond the houses of life's lottery winners, lies the ocean.

True that. Both of those things. I do start work next week so I only have a week to be this bored, luckily. Or maybe next week I will long for this week back. I've just never been one for exploring cities alone... Also I hope I win life's lottery and have a beach house. Where are you guys?
Kiawah island, sc. A lovely, secluded bubble for the wealthy. The whole island's gated. Nevertheless, i love being here.
Though things are improving--parents say they never used to see black families here. I've seen a few. It's rather sedate, golf, tennis, bike trails. Have
to go into charleston or neighboring public islands for any kind of night life or gathered young people. I've already read two books.
Aside--my potter says we can pit fire things this summer. That is, dig a hole, insert pots, and set aflame for twelve or so hours. Very excited... Are pe

That sounds fun if overly privileged :P how is the weather? Any better for the beach than here? The fire pit thing sounds AWESOME! :D Anna is in hca but she works during the week and is studying for one last final she is taking Thursday when she isn't at work. I visited her yesterday and ill probably go tomorrow. Once she is done on Friday she will visit me :P but I have no Internet still so she can't study here. I love how my iPhone auto-capitalizes Internet haha :)
